definition: equally true for (all the rest)/the same thing applies (for everyone)

sentences.english: Also the Kui gets thus, otherwise, really fear that that horse will accept to can not stand them.
sentences.chinese: 也虧得如此，不然，真怕那匹馬會承受不了他們。

sentences.english: If you think he is a good man, think again.
sentences.chinese: 萬一你以爲他是善人，那你就大謬不然了。

sentences.english: You just swaller some of it once—you'll see.
sentences.chinese: 要不然，你現在就吞點下肚，有你好看的。

sentences.english: My raven never reached him, elsewise he would have come.
sentences.chinese: 我的烏鴉一定是沒到他那裏，不然他一定會回來的。

sentences.english: Don't look behind or you may fall.
sentences.chinese: 別向後看，不然你會摔跤的。

sentences.english: Mind how you carry that pot; you'll spill some of the water out.
sentences.chinese: 端那隻鍋的時候當心一點，不然會把水潑出來的。

sentences.english: There are many scrapes on the floor due to frequent cleaning.
sentences.chinese: 移動桌子的時候要小心，不然會在地上留下擦痕。
說正經事吧，不然我就走了。

sentences.english: The monk can run away, but he can run with the temple.
sentences.chinese: 要不然跑得了和尚，跑不了廟啊。

sentences.english: SHAKIR:Nay! if he desist not, We would certainly smite his forehead.
sentences.chinese: 絕不然，如果他不停止，我一定要抓住他的額髮。

sentences.english: Otherwise, special infant formula is recommended.
sentences.chinese: 不然的話，建議用特殊嬰兒配方。

sentences.english: Unless you are a native Indian, everyone emigrated from somewhere.
sentences.chinese: 除非你是印度土著，不然人都是各處移民的。

sentences.english: Are you going to say"Love me"? If, not, hearken unto me.
sentences.chinese: 你要說“愛我”嗎？若不然，你就聽我說。

sentences.english: The breath goes now, and some say no;
sentences.chinese: 嘆其氣絕魂離，亦有說不然。

sentences.english: People always believe that self-criticism, self-recognition is not.
sentences.chinese: 自我批評總能讓人相信，自我表揚則不然。

sentences.english: If he is missing, it will be your life for his life, or you must pay a talent of silver.
sentences.chinese: 不然，你必交出一他連得銀子來。

definition: to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
only if (..., or otherwise, ...)/only when/only in the case that/unless
just in case/if by any chance/contingency
when the moment comes/at that time
to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
